name: $launch-ehr
desc: support for SMART’s Standalone Launch mode.

name: $launch-standalone
desc: support for SMART’s public client profile (no client authentication).

name: $client-public
desc: support for SMART’s confidential client profile (symmetric client secret authentication).

name: $client-confidential-symmetric
desc: support for SMART’s OpenID Connect profile.

name: $sso-openid-connect
desc: support for “need patient banner” launch context (conveyed via need_patient_banner token parameter).

name: $context-passthrough-banner
desc: support for “SMART style URL” launch context (conveyed via smart_style_url token parameter).

name: $context-passthrough-style
desc: support for patient-level launch context (requested by launch/patient scope, conveyed via patient token parameter).

name: $context-ehr-patient
desc: support for encounter-level launch context (requested by launch/encounter scope, conveyed via encounter token parameter).

name: $context-ehr-encounter
desc: support for patient-level launch context (requested by launch/patient scope, conveyed via patient token parameter).

name: $context-standalone-patient
desc: support for encounter-level launch context (requested by launch/encounter scope, conveyed via encounter token parameter).

name: $context-standalone-encounter
desc: support for refresh tokens (requested by offline_access scope).
